extendedInfo.description: Chapman's Parking App gives you up-to-the minute information on two of our campus parking lots.  See the number of spots available in the Lastinger and Barrera parking structures. Features include: - Quick access screen to view availability in two parking structures -  Ability to customize the Available Parking screen to show you the number of spots taken, or the number of spots still available -  For infrequent visitors a convenient map is provided showing the location of each structure, as well the ability to retrieve directions from your current location to a specific structure -  Detailed maps are provided showing the entrances to each structure as well

reviews.title: Easy to use!
reviews.comment: Great app that shows where I\'ll find parking on campus. The map is good for people who don\'t visit often.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Now if only the sensors in the parking structures worked right!
reviews.author: A Google User
